Name: Credit Points
Desc: Credit Points are kept on Sensei's card and can be used like cash.

Name: Pyroxenes
Desc: These mystical gems can be purchased with Sensei's credit card. Trade them for various products.

Desc: These mystical gems can be purchased with Sensei's credit card. Use them to purchase various products.

Name: AP
Desc: Sensei's vigor level. It is depleted when you perform certain actions.

Name: Lesson Ticket
Desc: A ticket used to visit various areas while carrying out your schedule.

Name: Tactical Challenge Ticket
Desc: A ticket to engage in a Tactical Challenge.

Name: Total Assault Ticket
Desc: A ticket to engage in a Total Assault.

Name: Bounty (Road) Ticket
Desc: A ticket to participate in a Bounty.

Desc: An entry ticket for Commissions.

Name: Expert Permit
Desc: A certificate that can only be obtained after gaining enough experience. Can be exchanged for various items.
